leaf_cluster_name: 科研表示学习与 embedding 生态
task_chain: 表示→索引→检索→探针评测→更新
tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + 评测

tools.name: AmpliGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Representation Learning on Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library for graph representation learning that provides a suite of neural machine learning models for relational learning on knowledge graphs, widely used in scientific knowledge discovery.

tools.name: GRAPE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph representation learning library for biological networks
tools.detailed_description: A Rust/Python library optimized for graph representation learning, specifically designed to handle large-scale biological networks for predictions and evaluations.

tools.name: BioELMo
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical version of ELMo embeddings pre-trained on PubMed
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical language model providing contextualized word embeddings, pre-trained on 10 million PubMed abstracts to improve performance on biomedical NLP tasks.

tools.name: Evo2
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for genome modeling and design across domains
tools.detailed_description: A genomic foundation model capable of modeling and design tasks across all domains of life, enabling zero-shot function prediction and generation of DNA sequences.

tools.name: TMbed
tools.one_line_profile: Transmembrane protein prediction using Language Model embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting transmembrane proteins and their features using embeddings from protein language models, offering high accuracy and speed.

tools.name: MMELON
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion
tools.detailed_description: An architecture that combines molecular representations from image, graph, and text views to learn a joint embedding for downstream chemical and biological property prediction.

tools.name: PST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Transformer for endowing PLMs with structural knowledge
tools.detailed_description: A model that integrates structural knowledge into pre-trained protein language models to improve representation learning for protein tasks.

tools.name: PCMol
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-target de novo molecular generator conditioned on protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for de novo drug design that generates molecules conditioned on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings to target specific protein structures.

tools.name: MULAN
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Protein Language Model for Sequence and Structure Encoding
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal protein language model that jointly encodes protein sequence and structure information for enhanced representation learning.

tools.name: SMILES Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained SMILES Transformer for molecular fingerprinting
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model pre-trained on SMILES strings to generate molecular fingerprints, useful for low-data drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: SiamDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-training Protein Encoder via Siamese Sequence-Structure Diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A pre-training framework for protein encoders that utilizes Siamese sequence-structure diffusion trajectory prediction to learn robust protein representations.

tools.name: esm-s
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-informed protein language model for protein representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates structural information to improve protein representation learning, useful for downstream tasks in protein engineering and biology.

tools.name: SpikeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic graph representation learning framework using Spiking Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for scaling up dynamic graph representation learning by leveraging Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs), offering energy-efficient processing for temporal graph data.

tools.name: InstructPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model trained with structure-based instructions
tools.detailed_description: A large protein language model trained to follow structure instructions, enhancing its ability to generate and analyze proteins with specific structural properties.

tools.name: InterPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for discovering interpretable features in protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit utilizing sparse autoencoders to extract and analyze interpretable features from Protein Language Models (PLMs), aiding in the understanding of black-box biological models.

tools.name: eICU-GNN-LSTM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning model for predicting patient outcomes in ICU
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid GNN-LSTM model designed to predict patient outcomes using data from the eICU database, leveraging graph representation learning to model patient states.

tools.name: MAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Masked graph representation learning for APT detection
tools.detailed_description: A security tool that utilizes masked graph representation learning to detect Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) by modeling system entity interactions.

tools.name: DySAT_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of DySAT for dynamic graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Deep Neural Representation Learning on Dynamic Graphs via Self-Attention Networks (DySAT), enabling embedding learning on temporal graph data.

tools.name: GTR
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning for complex table retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A model for retrieving complex tables using multi-granular graph representation learning, useful for structured data information retrieval.

tools.name: TinyDNABERT
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight genomic language model for DNA sequence analysis
tools.detailed_description: A compact genomic language model based on RoBERTa architecture and BPE tokenization, designed for efficient DNA sequence embedding and analysis.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for applying graph neural networks to materials chemistry tasks, facilitating property prediction and materials discovery.

tools.name: wxECGAnalyzer
tools.one_line_profile: ECG signal analysis and algorithm validation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for designing and validating Electrocardiogram (ECG) signal algorithms, including preprocessing, QRS detection, and segmentation.

tools.name: REGAL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning-based graph alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A framework for graph alignment using representation learning based on implicit matrix factorization and structural embeddings.

tools.name: QSoME
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Solid and Molecular Embedding library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Quantum Solid and Molecular Embedding, facilitating quantum chemical calculations and simulations.

tools.name: BioBERTpt
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical and Clinical BERT model for Portuguese
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained BERT model adapted for biomedical and clinical text in the Portuguese language, enabling NLP tasks in this specific domain.

tools.name: WSI-HGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous graph learning for whole slide image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A heterogeneous graph neural network framework for analyzing histopathology whole slide images (WSI), capturing complex tissue structures.

tools.name: SELFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning using SELFIES language models
tools.detailed_description: A chemical language model leveraging SELFIES strings for molecular representation learning, suitable for various cheminformatics tasks.

tools.name: scELMo
tools.one_line_profile: Language model embeddings for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A method applying embeddings from language models (ELMo) to single-cell data, facilitating analysis and learning from scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: Ligand_Generation
tools.one_line_profile: Target-aware ligand generation using multimodal protein representation
tools.detailed_description: A framework using target-aware Variational Auto-encoders (VAEs) and multimodal protein representation learning for generating novel ligands.

tools.name: otter-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced representation learning for drug target binding
tools.detailed_description: A library that enriches protein and drug representations with knowledge graphs to improve drug-target binding affinity predictions.

tools.name: ProtFlash
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient protein language model designed for protein sequence analysis and representation learning.

tools.name: scDEED
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical method for detecting dubious single-cell embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A statistical tool (scDED) for evaluating the quality of non-linear embeddings in single-cell data analysis by detecting dubious representations.

tools.name: agatha
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based hypothesis generation from graphs
tools.detailed_description: An automatic graph-mining and Transformer-based approach for generating scientific hypotheses from large-scale literature-derived graphs.

tools.name: CLAPE-SMB
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein-small molecule binding prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to predict binding sites between proteins and small molecules.

tools.name: Facial-Graph-Representation-Learning
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning for micro-expression recognition
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for recognizing micro-expressions using facial graph representation learning and action unit fusion.

tools.name: Neural-Temporal-Walks
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-aware representation learning on continuous-time dynamic graphs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Neural Temporal Walks for learning representations on continuous-time dynamic graphs, incorporating motif awareness.

tools.name: DECIMER-Image_Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for chemical structure image to SMILES conversion
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses transformer architectures to convert images of chemical structures into SMILES strings, enabling digitization of chemical literature.

tools.name: PHATE
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing high dimensional biological data via potential of heat-diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A dimensionality reduction and visualization tool designed to preserve both local and global structures in high-dimensional biological data using heat-diffusion potentials.

tools.name: Compound_Protein_Interac_Pred
tools.one_line_profile: Enzyme activity prediction using substrate encodings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting enzyme activity on novel substrates using improved substrate encodings and convolutional pooling techniques.

tools.name: scGraph2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for gene embedding in single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model that learns gene embeddings from single-cell omics data (scRNA-seq or scATAC-seq) using a variational graph autoencoder.

tools.name: TransE-Knowledge-Graph-Embedding
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE for knowledge graph embedding
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of the TransE algorithm and its extensions for learning low-dimensional representations of entities and relationships in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: RE-GCN
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutional representation learning for temporal knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A recurrent evolution network based on GCN (RE-GCN) for reasoning on temporal knowledge graphs by modeling the evolution of entity and relation representations.

tools.name: XAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-engine framework for antimicrobial peptide discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining ESM-2 and Transformer models to discover antimicrobial peptides, specifically applied to deciphering the deep-sea antimicrobial peptidome.

tools.name: LD-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient contextualized representation for sequence labeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for efficient contextualized representation learning through language model pruning, optimized for sequence labeling tasks.

tools.name: LucaVirus
tools.one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for virus analysis
tools.detailed_description: A unified language model for modeling the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses by integrating genomic and protein data.

tools.name: DNABERT-2
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient foundation model for multi-species genome embedding and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for genomics that replaces tokenization with BPE and uses Flash Attention to handle long DNA sequences efficiently. It provides pre-trained embeddings for various genomic tasks.

tools.name: DNABERT-S
tools.one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA embedding model using contrastive learning
tools.detailed_description: A genome foundation model designed to generate discriminative DNA embeddings that capture species-specific information, useful for metagenomics and species identification tasks.

tools.name: CodonFM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-resolution protein language model for diverse species
tools.detailed_description: A family of language models trained on 130 million protein-coding sequences across over 20,000 species, operating at codon resolution to capture biological information.

tools.name: biobert_embedding
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting embeddings from BioBERT models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the extraction of token and sentence-level embeddings from pre-trained BioBERT models for biomedical NLP tasks.

tools.name: ProLLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for multi-task processing
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model specifically adapted for protein sequences, capable of handling multiple protein language processing tasks including generation and property prediction.

tools.name: Snekmer
tools.one_line_profile: Kmer-based protein sequence analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool for applying encoded Kmer analysis to protein sequences, useful for motif discovery and sequence classification, developed by PNNL.

tools.name: PaccMann Proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language modeling tools for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Part of the PaccMann framework, this repository provides models and tools for protein language modeling, specifically geared towards drug discovery and proteomics applications.

tools.name: scTAG
tools.one_line_profile: ZINB-based graph embedding autoencoder for scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that combines Zero-Inflated Negative Binomial (ZINB) models with graph embedding autoencoders for interpreting single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: Profluent-E1
tools.one_line_profile: Protein encoder models for representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A family of protein encoder models developed by Profluent, designed to generate high-quality representations of protein sequences for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: proseLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model adapted for structure-conditioned design, allowing for the generation of protein sequences that fold into specific structures.

tools.name: SeqDance
tools.one_line_profile: Biophysics-informed protein language models for sequence analysis
tools.detailed_description: SeqDance and ESMDance are biophysics-informed protein language models designed to capture evolutionary and structural information from protein sequences for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: Content-Aware-Node2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding method for biomedical ontologies combining structure and text
tools.detailed_description: A tool for embedding biomedical ontologies by jointly encoding network structure and textual node descriptors, useful for biomedical knowledge graph analysis.

tools.name: pykg2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Python library for knowledge graph embedding
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for knowledge graph embedding and representation learning, providing implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms for research and application in scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: iFeature
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generating numerical feature representations from protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python-based toolkit for generating various numerical feature representation schemes from protein or peptide sequences, including feature clustering, selection, and dimensionality reduction.

tools.name: MCNS
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning with advanced negative sampling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Understanding Negative Sampling in Graph Representation Learning', providing a solver for training graph embeddings with improved negative sampling strategies.

tools.name: ProteinLM
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained protein language models for sequence representation
tools.detailed_description: A repository for Protein Language Models developed by THUDM, enabling the generation of embeddings for protein sequences to support downstream bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-modal representation learning framework combining sequence, graph, and geometry information for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: OpenBioSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for bio-sequence representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A repository focusing on supervised and self-supervised biological sequence representation learning, providing models and tools for analyzing DNA/protein sequences.

tools.name: seq2seq-fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised deep molecular embedding for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Seq2seq Fingerprint', an unsupervised deep learning method to generate molecular embeddings (fingerprints) for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-to-LM interpreter for text-attributed graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework harnessing explanations from Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance text-attributed graph representation learning, useful for knowledge graphs and scientific networks.

tools.name: DeepGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning for drug-target binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool combining graph and sequence representations to predict drug-target binding affinity.

tools.name: CLAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein-ligand binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing contrastive learning and pre-trained encoders to predict protein-ligand binding sites.

tools.name: SigmaCCS
tools.one_line_profile: Collision cross section prediction using Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for highly accurate and large-scale collision cross section (CCS) prediction to aid in compound identification in mass spectrometry.

tools.name: SmileCode
tools.one_line_profile: Deformable image registration via Motion Decomposition Transformer
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ModeT for deformable medical image registration, utilizing transformers to decompose motion fields.

tools.name: STC-GS
tools.one_line_profile: Radar sequence prediction for weather nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for high-dynamic radar sequence prediction in weather nowcasting using Spatiotemporal Coherent Gaussian Representation.

tools.name: Explainable-Automated-Medical-Coding
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable automated coding of clinical notes
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Hierarchical Label-wise Attention Networks (HLAN) for automated and explainable medical coding from clinical text.

tools.name: Ankh
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized protein language model for biological tasks
tools.detailed_description: Ankh is an optimized protein language model designed to learn efficient representations of protein sequences for various downstream biological prediction tasks.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pre-trained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: ProtTrans provides a collection of state-of-the-art pre-trained language models (ProtBert, ProtT5, etc.) for generating protein sequence embeddings.

tools.name: ProSST
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid language model for directed protein evolution
tools.detailed_description: An advanced hybrid language model designed to assist in directed protein evolution by learning protein sequence-structure relationships.

tools.name: KDDCUP_2020_AutoGraph_1st_Place
tools.one_line_profile: Winning solution for Automatic Graph Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: The 1st place solution for KDD CUP 2020, providing an automated framework for graph representation learning, useful as a baseline or reference implementation.

tools.name: SciBERT
tools.one_line_profile: A pretrained BERT model specifically for scientific text processing
tools.detailed_description: A BERT model trained on a large corpus of scientific text (semantics, computer science, biomedical), designed to improve performance on downstream scientific NLP tasks.

tools.name: SPECTER
tools.one_line_profile: Document-level representation learning using citation-informed transformers
tools.detailed_description: A model for generating document-level embeddings of scientific papers by leveraging citation information as a supervision signal, enabling effective downstream tasks like recommendation and classification.

tools.name: mini3di
tools.one_line_profile: Port of Foldseek code for encoding protein structures to 3di sequences
tools.detailed_description: A NumPy implementation for converting protein tertiary structures into 3di sequences (structure-based sequences), facilitating structure-aware protein analysis and embedding.

tools.name: Earthformer
tools.one_line_profile: Space-time Transformer for earth system forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (Earthformer) designed for earth system forecasting problems, such as precipitation nowcasting, using a space-time transformer architecture.

tools.name: DySAT
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Graph Representation Learning via Self-Attention
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of DySAT (Dynamic Self-Attention Network), a model for learning node representations in dynamic graphs, applicable to evolving scientific networks.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for chemistry and biology
tools.detailed_description: A DGL-based package for applying graph neural networks to tasks in chemistry and biology, including molecular property prediction and generative models.

tools.name: Context_Aware_SSL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Self-supervised Representation Learning for Medical Images
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of context-aware self-supervised learning for medical image representation, utilizing graph structures to capture relationships.

tools.name: ntEmbd
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning embedding for nucleotide sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating embeddings for nucleotide sequences using deep learning, developed by the Michael Smith Genome Sciences Centre.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Representation Learning Library for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for molecular representation learning, providing various models and benchmarks for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: SPROF-GO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using pretrained language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein functions (GO terms) from sequences using pretrained protein language models and homology-based label diffusion.

tools.name: pytorch-graphsage
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GraphSAGE for graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of GraphSAGE, a framework for inductive representation learning on large graphs, applicable to scientific networks.

tools.name: efficient-evolution
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient evolution from protein language models
tools.detailed_description: Algorithms for efficient directed evolution of proteins using protein language models to guide the search in sequence space.

tools.name: Evolocity
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary velocity with protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating evolutionary velocity of proteins using language models, enabling analysis of evolutionary trends and dynamics.

tools.name: DPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Diffusion Protein Language Models (DPLM) for generative modeling of protein sequences and structures.

tools.name: GEMS
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Binding Affinity Prediction with GNN and PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity using Graph Neural Networks and transfer learning from pre-trained Protein Language Models.

tools.name: Chainer Chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Library for Biology and Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library based on Chainer for deep learning applications in biology and chemistry, specifically focusing on graph convolutional networks for molecules.

tools.name: N-Gram Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Unsupervised Representation for Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of N-Gram Graph, a simple and effective unsupervised method for learning graph representations.

tools.name: METL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for pretraining and finetuning biophysics-informed protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for Mutational Effect Transfer Learning (METL) that enables the pretraining and finetuning of protein language models with a focus on biophysical information, aiding in the prediction of mutational effects.

tools.name: S3V2_IDEAS_ESMP
tools.one_line_profile: Epigenetic data normalization and state calling tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing S3norm version 2 and IDEAS for epigenetic state modeling and master peak list generation, used in genomics to normalize and analyze epigenetic signals.

tools.name: Specter
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for plotting nuclear data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for visualizing nuclear data analysis results, utilizing Dear ImGui and ImPlot for rendering.

tools.name: MolGraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating self-supervised molecular graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating self-supervised learning methods applied to molecular graph embeddings, providing benchmarks for representation quality in chemistry tasks.

tools.name: MVGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive Multi-View Representation Learning on Graphs implementation
tools.detailed_description: A DGL-based implementation of Contrastive Multi-View Representation Learning on Graphs (MVGRL), a method for generating node and graph embeddings via contrastive learning.

tools.name: MolReactGen
tools.one_line_profile: Auto-regressive model for molecule and reaction template generation
tools.detailed_description: An auto-regressive causal language model based on GPT-2 for generating molecules (SMILES) and reaction templates (SMARTS), facilitating chemical synthesis planning.

tools.name: Transformers
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art machine learning framework for sequence models
tools.detailed_description: The de facto standard library for transformer models, widely used in AI for Science for implementing and using protein (ProtBERT), DNA (DNABERT), and chemical (ChemBERTa) language models.

tools.name: ProGen2-finetuning
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for finetuning ProGen2 protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and scripts for finetuning the ProGen2 protein language model to generate protein sequences for specific families or properties.

tools.name: SIMBA
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell embedding method using features
tools.detailed_description: SIMBA (SIngle-cell eMBedding Along with features) is a tool for joint embedding of single cells and their features (genes, peaks) into a shared latent space.

tools.name: GraphGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning with Generative Adversarial Nets
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of GraphGAN, a framework that unifies generative and discriminative methods for graph representation learning.

tools.name: TemStaPro
tools.one_line_profile: Protein thermostability prediction using language model embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A software tool that predicts protein thermostability by leveraging sequence representations derived from protein language models.

tools.name: GNNs for Quantum Chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks implementations for Quantum Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Graph Neural Network implementations specifically tailored for quantum chemistry tasks, serving as a library for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Nucleotide Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation models for genomics and transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A suite of large-scale foundation models trained on nucleotide sequences, enabling downstream tasks in genomics and transcriptomics via embeddings.

tools.name: DNABERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained BERT model for DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers (BERT) model specifically designed for DNA sequences to capture genomic features.

tools.name: FamPlex
tools.one_line_profile: Resource for grounding protein families and complexes
tools.detailed_description: A namespace and resource for encoding hierarchical relationships between proteins, families, and complexes, widely used for entity resolution and grounding in biomedical text mining.

tools.name: ProteinClusterTools
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for clustering protein families using embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to explore protein families by generating clusters in sequence space using homology-based or vector representation-based methods.

tools.name: SCALEX
tools.one_line_profile: Online single-cell data integration tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for online integration of single-cell data by projecting heterogeneous datasets into a common cell-embedding space.

tools.name: Retrosynthesis-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based retrosynthesis prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing Transformer sequence-to-sequence models and SMILES-based data augmentation for predicting retrosynthetic reaction pathways.

tools.name: pLM-BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Remote homology detection using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that detects remote homology between proteins by comparing representations derived from protein language models, serving as an alternative to sequence alignment methods like BLAST.

tools.name: PLM-interact
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model extension for predicting protein-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: A tool that extends protein language models (PLMs) to predict protein-protein interactions (PPI), leveraging pre-trained representations for biological interaction tasks.

tools.name: LanczosNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network based on Lanczos algorithm for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Lanczos Network, a deep graph convolutional network designed for learning on graph-structured data, specifically benchmarked on QM8 quantum chemistry datasets.

tools.name: ProGen (Jax)
tools.one_line_profile: Jax implementation of ProGen for protein sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of ProGen, a controllable protein language model for generating protein sequences with specific properties, written in Jax.

tools.name: esmdiff
tools.one_line_profile: Structure language models for protein conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for generating protein conformations using structure language models, implementing diffusion-based approaches for protein structure tasks.

tools.name: ConFit
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive fitness learning for protein fitness landscape prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reprogramming protein language models using contrastive fitness learning to predict protein fitness landscapes with low-N data.

tools.name: SciBERT_CN
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained BERT model for Chinese scientific text
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained language model specifically designed for processing and embedding Chinese scientific text, enabling downstream scientific NLP tasks.

tools.name: biofm-eval
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding extraction library for BioFM genomics foundation model
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to extract embeddings for DNA sequences using the BioFM genomics foundation model, facilitating genomic analysis tasks.

tools.name: Hyper-SAGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Self-attention based graph neural network for hypergraphs
tools.detailed_description: A hypergraph representation learning tool using self-attention graph neural networks, applicable to complex biological networks and systems biology.

tools.name: GCP-VQVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete VQ-VAE for protein 3D structure
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GCP-VQVAE, a geometry-complete language model for encoding and decoding protein 3D structures using vector quantization.

tools.name: OChemR
tools.one_line_profile: Optical chemical structure recognition and reaction interpretation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses Vision Transformers (DETR) to detect and classify molecules, text, and arrows in chemical reaction images, translating them into SMILES or text.

tools.name: EndoFM-LV
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for endoscopy video analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for analyzing endoscopy videos via representation learning on long sequences, improving medical video analysis tasks.

tools.name: TopoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based protein backbone generation with global geometry
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based model for generating protein backbones that incorporates global-geometry-aware latent encoding to improve structure quality.

tools.name: ProstT5
tools.one_line_profile: Bilingual language model for protein sequence and structure
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model capable of translating between protein sequences and 3D structures (Foldseek sequences), enabling structure-aware sequence analysis.

tools.name: SeqVec
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning embeddings for protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating continuous vector representations (embeddings) for protein sequences using deep learning (ELMo-based), capturing biophysical properties.

tools.name: peft_proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: LoRA adapters for protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for applying Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) methods like LoRA to protein language models, facilitating efficient adaptation to downstream tasks.

tools.name: apetokenizer
tools.one_line_profile: Tokenizer for chemical SMILES and SELFIES
tools.detailed_description: A tokenizer specifically designed for chemical representations like SMILES and SELFIES, enabling their use in Transformer-based models.

tools.name: OhmNet
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning in multi-layer tissue networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning node representations in multi-layer graphs, specifically designed for modeling tissue-specific protein-protein interaction networks.

tools.name: USPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Signal peptide predictor with deep protein language model
tools.detailed_description: An unbiased, organism-agnostic, and highly sensitive signal peptide predictor leveraging deep protein language models for sequence analysis.

tools.name: MolecularTransformerEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for molecular text representation translation and embedding
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer neural network trained to translate between different molecular text representations (e.g., SMILES, IUPAC) and generate molecular embeddings.

tools.name: BioBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained biomedical language representation model
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained biomedical language representation model designed for biomedical text mining tasks such as named entity recognition, relation extraction, and question answering.

tools.name: BLUE Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Language Understanding Evaluation benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite consisting of five different biomedicine text-mining tasks with ten corpora, used to evaluate biomedical language models.

tools.name: BioSentVec
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained embeddings for biomedical words and sentences
tools.detailed_description: A set of pre-trained embeddings (BioWordVec and BioSentVec) for biomedical words and sentences, trained on PubMed and MIMIC-III clinical notes.

tools.name: text2brain
tools.one_line_profile: Generating brain activation maps from free-form text queries
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that synthesizes brain activation maps (e.g., fMRI) from text descriptions, bridging natural language and neuroscience to visualize brain responses to semantic inputs.

tools.name: CaLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model trained on coding DNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A language model (Codon adaptation Language Model) trained on DNA sequences to learn protein representations, optimized for codon usage bias and expression prediction.

tools.name: esm2quinox
tools.one_line_profile: ESM2 protein language model implementation in Equinox/JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX/Equinox implementation of the ESM2 protein language model, enabling efficient training and inference on TPUs/GPUs for biological sequence analysis.

tools.name: FAPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and efficient PyTorch implementation of Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: An optimized implementation of protein language models (like ESM) in PyTorch, focusing on training efficiency and drop-in replacement capabilities for bio-NLP tasks.

tools.name: Lobster
tools.one_line_profile: Language model for biological sequence transformation and evolution
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model designed to learn evolutionary landscapes and predict fitness effects, useful for protein engineering and design tasks.

tools.name: cytoself
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised learning for protein localization from images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for learning protein localization representations from microscopy images in a self-supervised manner, enabling automated phenotypic analysis.

tools.name: AbMap
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model customized for antibody representation
tools.detailed_description: A transfer-learning based protein language model specifically fine-tuned for antibody sequences to predict functional properties and embed antibody space.

tools.name: GNSS_IMU
tools.one_line_profile: Loosely coupled GNSS/IMU sensor fusion implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of GNSS and IMU sensor fusion algorithms for precise navigation and positioning, utilizing Kalman filtering techniques.

tools.name: RXNMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-guided atom-mapping for chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model that extracts atom-mapping information from chemical reactions using attention weights, aiding in reaction mechanism understanding and pathway prediction.

tools.name: ProVis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and interpretation of protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for interpreting the attention mechanisms of protein language models (like BERT trained on proteins) to understand captured biological features and structural information.

tools.name: Mol2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Vector representations of molecular substructures
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised machine learning approach to learn vector representations of molecular substructures, inspired by Word2Vec, for cheminformatics and drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model predicting drug-target interactions by aligning protein and molecule representations using contrastive learning and language models to achieve high accuracy.

tools.name: esmologs
tools.one_line_profile: Local homology search tool integrating ESM-2 embeddings with Foldseek and HMMER
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing local homology searches by leveraging the ESM-2 protein language model in conjunction with structural search tools like Foldseek, HHsuite, and HMMER. It facilitates the identification of remote homologs using protein embeddings.

tools.name: BioFLAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained contextualized embeddings for biomedical sequence labeling
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical NLP tool providing pretrained pooled contextualized embeddings specifically designed for biomedical sequence labeling tasks such as Named Entity Recognition (NER) and Part-of-Speech (POS) tagging.

tools.name: ehr-relation-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: NER and relation extraction pipeline for Electronic Health Records
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for extracting entities and their relations from Electronic Health Records (EHR) using deep learning models. It supports tasks like clinical named entity recognition and relation extraction.

tools.name: MIL-RBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Noise reduction model for distantly supervised biomedical relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a data-driven approach for noise reduction in distantly supervised biomedical relation extraction, utilizing Multi-Instance Learning and BERT (MIL-RBERT).

tools.name: InfoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised graph-level representation learning via mutual information maximization
tools.detailed_description: A graph representation learning tool that learns graph-level representations by maximizing the mutual information between graph-level and substructure-level representations. Widely applicable to molecular graph analysis.

tools.name: prose
tools.one_line_profile: Protein sequence embedding models using multi-task and masked language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating protein sequence embeddings using models trained with multi-task learning and masked language modeling objectives. Useful for downstream protein structure and function prediction tasks.

tools.name: NetSolP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein solubility and usability prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that predicts the solubility and usability for purification of proteins expressed in E. coli, leveraging protein language models for feature extraction and prediction.

tools.name: grover
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for large-scale molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art graph transformer framework for learning molecular representations from large-scale unlabeled molecular data using self-supervised learning tasks.

tools.name: seq2tens
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence representation learning via low-rank tensor projections
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient sequence representation learning that utilizes low-rank tensor projections to capture long-range dependencies and structural features in sequences.

tools.name: cpa
tools.one_line_profile: Compositional Perturbation Autoencoder for single-cell drug response prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative framework (Compositional Perturbation Autoencoder) designed to learn and predict the effects of perturbations (e.g., drugs) at the single-cell level, enabling out-of-distribution predictions of drug combinations.

tools.name: JointGT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-Text joint representation learning for knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for learning joint representations of knowledge graphs and text, specifically designed to enhance text generation tasks grounded in knowledge graph data.

tools.name: DKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph representation learning with entity descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning representations of knowledge graphs by incorporating entity descriptions, enhancing the embeddings of entities, especially for those with few relational facts.

tools.name: TKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph representation learning with hierarchical types
tools.detailed_description: A representation learning framework for knowledge graphs that incorporates hierarchical type information of entities to improve embedding quality and reasoning capabilities.

tools.name: graph-representation-learning
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of graph representation learning models including autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing various graph representation learning methods, including autoencoders for link prediction and semi-supervised node classification, serving as a reference library for graph embedding techniques.

tools.name: WellcomeML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning utility library for biomedical and health research
tools.detailed_description: A utility library developed by the Wellcome Trust Data Labs to facilitate machine learning tasks in biomedical and health research, including NLP and data processing utilities.

tools.name: Evolla
tools.one_line_profile: ProteinChat: Generative protein language model
tools.detailed_description: Implements ProteinChat, a frontier protein-language generative model designed to decode the molecular language of proteins and facilitate interactive protein analysis.

tools.name: ProTrek
tools.one_line_profile: Trimodal protein language model for illuminating the protein universe
tools.detailed_description: A trimodal protein language model that integrates sequence, structure, and text descriptions to learn comprehensive protein representations for various downstream tasks.

tools.name: SaProt
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware protein language model using Foldseek alphabet
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates structural information using a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) derived from Foldseek, enabling structure-aware protein representation learning.

tools.name: SaprotHub
tools.one_line_profile: Accessible platform for protein language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and platform designed to make protein language modeling accessible to biologists, providing easy-to-use interfaces for training and inference with models like SaProt.

tools.name: GraphSAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Inductive representation learning on large graphs
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation of GraphSAGE, a framework for inductive representation learning on large graphs. It generates embeddings by sampling and aggregating features from a node's local neighborhood.

tools.name: proteinclip
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein and natural language models
tools.detailed_description: A model that harmonizes protein language models and natural language models using contrastive learning, enabling cross-modal tasks like text-to-protein retrieval.

tools.name: BioNEV
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for graph embedding on biomedical networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for evaluating graph embedding methods specifically on biomedical networks. It includes implementations of various embedding algorithms and datasets for tasks like link prediction and node classification in biology.

tools.name: EpiAnno
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell epigenomic data annotation via supervised non-linear embedding
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for annotating cell types in single-cell epigenomic data (such as scATAC-seq) using a supervised non-linear embedding approach to capture cell-type specific features.

tools.name: gLM
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic language model for predicting protein co-regulation and function
tools.detailed_description: A genomic language model trained on metagenomic data to learn representations of gene contexts, enabling the prediction of protein co-regulation and functional associations.

tools.name: gmvae
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable embeddings from molecular simulations using Gaussian Mixture VAEs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating interpretable low-dimensional embeddings from molecular simulation trajectories using Gaussian Mixture Variational Autoencoders (GMVAE), aiding in the analysis of molecular dynamics.

tools.name: GREET
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised graph representation learning for edge heterophily discrimination
tools.detailed_description: A graph representation learning method designed to handle graphs with edge heterophily by discriminating between homophilic and heterophilic edges, applicable to various scientific graph data.

tools.name: gene-embedding-benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for gene embeddings on biological tasks
tools.detailed_description: A repository for benchmarking various gene embedding methods across single, paired, and gene set tasks, providing a framework for evaluating representation quality in bioinformatics.

tools.name: CellSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable sequence-informed embedding for single-cell ATAC-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning sequence-informed embeddings of single-cell ATAC-seq data, enabling scalable analysis and integration of chromatin accessibility profiles.

tools.name: R-Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that utilizes deep protein language models and machine learning to predict and annotate plant disease resistance genes (R-genes) from protein sequences.

tools.name: NeuralKG
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source toolkit for knowledge graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolkit for knowledge graph representation learning, supporting various embedding models (TransE, RotatE, etc.) and GNN-based methods for scientific and general knowledge graphs.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset of biomolecular instructions designed to tune Large Language Models (LLMs) for tasks in biology and chemistry, facilitating the application of LLMs in scientific discovery.

tools.name: GMI
tools.one_line_profile: Graph representation learning via graphical mutual information maximization
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Graphical Mutual Information (GMI) maximization for graph representation learning, providing a method to learn node embeddings by maximizing the mutual information between input and output of a graph encoder.

tools.name: RzenEmbed
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal embedding model optimized for RAG and visual document understanding
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal embedding model designed to prioritize Multimodal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It achieves high performance on benchmarks like MMEB and VisDoc, making it suitable for scientific document retrieval and analysis tasks involving mixed text and visual data.

tools.name: Ovis
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Large Language Model architecture for structural visual-textual alignment
tools.detailed_description: A novel Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM) architecture designed to structurally align visual and textual embeddings. It serves as a foundational tool for tasks requiring deep integration and understanding of visual and textual data, applicable to scientific image analysis and description.

tools.name: CEBRA
tools.one_line_profile: Learnable latent embeddings for joint behavioral and neural analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning latent embeddings that jointly represent behavioral and neural data. It uses contrastive learning to uncover consistent latent structures in complex neuroscientific datasets, facilitating the analysis of neural dynamics and behavior.

tools.name: coupledAE-patchseq
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal data alignment and cell type analysis using coupled autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A tool for aligning multimodal data, specifically designed for Patch-seq data analysis. It utilizes coupled autoencoders to integrate electrophysiological, transcriptomic, and morphological data, enabling robust cell type classification and analysis in neuroscience.

tools.name: GPT-RAG Ingestion
tools.one_line_profile: Data ingestion service for multimodal RAG pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A service automating the processing of diverse documents (PDFs, images, spreadsheets) for Azure AI Search. It performs smart chunking and generates text and image embeddings, facilitating the creation of multimodal retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems for scientific knowledge management.

tools.name: UME-Search
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Multimodal Embedding framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework aiming to provide universal multimodal embeddings. It supports the generation and utilization of embeddings that align different modalities, suitable for building cross-modal search and retrieval systems in scientific domains.

tools.name: biomed-multi-view
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion (MMELON)
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the MMELON architecture that combines molecular representations from images, graphs, and text. It learns a joint embedding to predict chemical and biological properties, serving as a specialized tool for drug discovery and molecular analysis.

tools.name: RWKV-LM
tools.one_line_profile: RNN-based Large Language Model with efficient representation learning
tools.detailed_description: RWKV is an RNN architecture that offers Transformer-level performance with linear complexity. It provides efficient sequence modeling and embedding capabilities, which can be applied to scientific sequence data (e.g., genomics, protein sequences) and large-scale text analysis.

tools.name: cca_layer
tools.one_line_profile: Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) Layer for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) layer. It is used for cross-modality retrieval and alignment tasks by maximizing the correlation between two views of data, a fundamental technique in multimodal scientific data analysis.

tools.name: block.bootstrap.pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal fusion library based on BLOCK bilinear fusion
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing the BLOCK (Bilinear Superdiagonal Fusion) method for multimodal fusion. It provides tools for combining representations from different modalities, applicable to various multimodal learning tasks in science.

tools.name: Clapeyron.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Thermodynamic modeling framework for fluid properties and equations of state
tools.detailed_description: Clapeyron.jl is a Julia library designed for the development and application of fluid-thermodynamic models. It supports a wide range of equations of state (SAFT, cubic, multi-parameter) to estimate fluid properties and phase equilibria, serving as a computational tool for chemical engineering and physics simulations.

tools.name: Prot2Text-V2
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction via multimodal contrastive alignment
tools.detailed_description: Prot2Text-V2 is a deep learning framework for predicting protein functions by aligning protein sequences with textual descriptions. It utilizes multimodal contrastive learning to generate unified representations that capture both structural and semantic functional information.

tools.name: MuSe-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Unified gene representation learning from multimodal biological graphs
tools.detailed_description: MuSe-GNN is a Graph Neural Network framework designed to learn unified gene representations by integrating multimodal biological graph data. It addresses the challenge of fusing diverse biological signals to improve gene functional analysis and related bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: BioMedKG
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal contrastive representation learning for biomedical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: BioMedKG implements a multimodal contrastive learning approach for Augmented Biomedical Knowledge Graphs. It aims to improve the representation of biomedical entities by leveraging both structural graph information and associated multimodal data, facilitating better knowledge discovery in biomedicine.

tools.name: DBT-Reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source reconstruction toolbox for digital breast tomosynthesis (DBT)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolbox for reconstruction in digital breast tomosynthesis, providing algorithms for medical imaging analysis and processing.

tools.name: pyDBT
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the LAVI-USP DBT reconstruction toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A Python extension package for the DBT (Digital Breast Tomosynthesis) reconstruction toolbox, enabling integration with Python-based scientific workflows.

tools.name: UnityMol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization and analysis software
tools.detailed_description: A molecular viewer and analysis tool based on the Unity3D game engine, designed for high-quality visualization of biological macromolecules and interactions.

tools.name: VoCo
tools.one_line_profile: Volume Contrastive Learning Framework for 3D Medical Image Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework for self-supervised learning on 3D medical images using volume contrastive learning, designed to improve representation learning for medical analysis tasks.

tools.name: MedKLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Medical knowledge-enhanced language-image pre-training model for radiology
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific vision-language model pre-trained on medical data to handle unseen diseases in zero-shot classification and grounding tasks, leveraging medical knowledge to enhance representation learning.

tools.name: EEG-To-Text
tools.one_line_profile: Open vocabulary electroencephalography-to-text decoding model
tools.detailed_description: A framework for decoding EEG signals into text and performing zero-shot sentiment classification, bridging the gap between brain signals and natural language representations.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Vision and language foundation model for pathology image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale pre-trained model for Pathology AI that extracts visual and language features from pathology images and text descriptions, enabling zero-shot classification and retrieval.

tools.name: RLHF-V
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-grained correctional human feedback framework for aligning multimodal large language models
tools.detailed_description: A research framework and toolkit for aligning Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) using fine-grained segment-level human corrections. It addresses the hallucination problem in MLLMs by collecting high-quality human feedback and performing behavior alignment, enhancing model trustworthiness.

tools.name: OpenOmni
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source omnimodal large language model with progressive alignment
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an omnimodal large language model capable of processing and synthesizing speech, text, and other modalities. It features a progressive multimodal alignment strategy and supports real-time self-aware emotional speech synthesis.

tools.name: PCL-CLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Prototypical contrastive learning for CLIP-based object re-identification
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for fine-tuning CLIP models specifically for the task of object re-identification (ReID). It utilizes prototypical contrastive learning to align visual representations for better retrieval performance.

tools.name: Radar-RGB-Attentive-Multimodal-Object-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal fusion framework for object detection using Radar and RGB sensors
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for robust object detection in autonomous vehicles by fusing data from Radar sensors and RGB cameras. It employs attention mechanisms to align and integrate features from different modalities.

tools.name: ZeroshotSemanticSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot semantic segmentation via joint visual-semantic embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing zero-shot semantic segmentation by leveraging a joint embedding space that aligns visual features with semantic word vectors, allowing the model to segment unseen classes.

tools.name: PepBCL
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based contrastive learning for protein-peptide binding prediction
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool that uses a BERT-based architecture and contrastive learning to predict protein-peptide binding residues from protein sequences. It aligns sequence representations to identify functional binding sites.

tools.name: IMG-Multimodal-Diffusion-Alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit multimodal guidance for calibrating diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for aligning diffusion models using implicit multimodal guidance (IMG). It aims to improve the generation quality and alignment of diffusion models by integrating multimodal signals during the generation process.

tools.name: VisPer-LM
tools.one_line_profile: Visual embedding distillation for enhancing multimodal LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for elevating visual perception in Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) through visual embedding distillation. It aligns visual features more effectively with language models to improve performance on visual tasks.

tools.name: H-CLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperspherical parameter-efficient fine-tuning for CLIP
tools.detailed_description: A method and codebase for parameter-efficient fine-tuning of CLIP models in hyperspherical space, specifically designed for open-vocabulary semantic segmentation tasks.

tools.name: HyperCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic space fine-tuning for CLIP-based segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A research tool for understanding and implementing fine-tuning of CLIP models in hyperbolic space, targeting open-vocabulary semantic segmentation. It explores non-Euclidean geometries for better visual-semantic alignment.

tools.name: MMFAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed models for statistical analysis in agriculture
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing mixed model methodologies for agricultural data analysis. It facilitates scientific statistical modeling and inference for agricultural experiments.

tools.name: llano
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based data annotation and information extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Large Language Models (like ChatGPT) to serve as data annotators and zero-shot/few-shot information extractors, facilitating the creation of labeled datasets for scientific research.

tools.name: ICon
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementation for 'I-Con', designed to unify various representation learning paradigms. It provides tools for training and evaluating models that learn aligned representations across different domains.

tools.name: FIANet
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-grained image-text alignment for remote sensing segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network for referring remote sensing image segmentation. It focuses on fine-grained alignment between textual descriptions and remote sensing imagery to accurately segment referred objects.

tools.name: JointEmbedding
tools.one_line_profile: Joint embedding of 3D shapes and images
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning joint embeddings of 3D shapes and 2D images via CNN image purification. It enables cross-modal retrieval and alignment between 3D geometry and visual data.

tools.name: TALE
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function annotation with joint embedding
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for protein function annotation that uses a Transformer architecture to learn joint embeddings of protein features and functional labels.

tools.name: CVPR2022-AURL
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-uniformity aware representation learning for video classification
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Alignment-Uniformity aware Representation Learning (AURL) for zero-shot video classification. It optimizes the geometric properties of embeddings to improve video-text alignment.

tools.name: FusAtNet
tools.one_line_profile: Dual attention-based multimodal fusion for hyperspectral and LiDAR classification
tools.detailed_description: A network for fusing hyperspectral and LiDAR data for land cover classification. It utilizes dual attention mechanisms to align and integrate spectral and spatial features from different sensors.

tools.name: HACAN
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid attention-driven cross-layer alignment for image-text retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A network architecture designed for image-text retrieval that employs hybrid attention mechanisms to perform cross-layer alignment between visual and textual features.

tools.name: DuMMF
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic multi-person 3D motion forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A tool for forecasting 3D motion of multiple persons using stochastic methods. It models the interactions and dynamics of human motion for predictive analysis.

tools.name: MAKE
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced vision-language pretraining for dermatological assessment
tools.detailed_description: A medical AI tool for zero-shot dermatological assessment. It uses multi-aspect knowledge-enhanced vision-language pretraining to align medical images with clinical knowledge.

tools.name: SupWMA
tools.one_line_profile: Superficial white matter analysis with supervised contrastive learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for superficial white matter analysis using point-cloud-based networks and supervised contrastive learning. It ensures consistent tractography parcellation across populations and dMRI acquisitions.

tools.name: CRKD
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-modality knowledge distillation framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for cross-modality knowledge distillation (KD) designed to bridge the performance gap between different detector types (LC and CR). It facilitates knowledge transfer between modalities.

tools.name: Stem-JEPA
tools.one_line_profile: Joint embedding predictive architecture for musical stem compatibility
tools.detailed_description: A scientific tool for analyzing musical audio by estimating the compatibility of stems using a Joint Embedding Predictive Architecture (JEPA). It applies representation learning to music information retrieval.

tools.name: SimCLR
tools.one_line_profile: Simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of SimCLR, a framework for contrastive learning of visual representations. It serves as a foundational tool for self-supervised learning and alignment tasks.

tools.name: MiniRWKV-4
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal dialogue model implementation using RWKV and QFormer
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a multimodal image-text dialogue model combining Blip2, RWKV, and QFormer. It aims to achieve high-level cognitive capabilities with efficient resource usage.

tools.name: PROMU
tools.one_line_profile: Prompt-based alignment for multimodal entity and relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for multimodal entity and relation extraction that utilizes prompt-based learning to align visual and textual information, enhancing information extraction performance.

tools.name: KECG
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised entity alignment via joint knowledge embedding
tools.detailed_description: A tool for semi-supervised entity alignment in knowledge graphs. It employs a joint knowledge embedding model and a cross-graph model to align entities across different graphs.

tools.name: ABC
tools.one_line_profile: Control framework for multimodal embeddings using VLMs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for achieving better control over multimodal embeddings by leveraging Vision-Language Models (VLMs). It provides methods to regulate and refine embedding spaces for specific tasks.

tools.name: VLM2Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Training vision-language models for massive multimodal embedding tasks
tools.detailed_description: A library and training framework for converting Vision-Language Models into powerful embedding models capable of handling massive multimodal embedding tasks.

tools.name: COSA
tools.one_line_profile: Concatenated sample pretrained vision-language foundation model
tools.detailed_description: Code and models for COSA, a vision-language foundation model pretrained with concatenated samples. It serves as a base for various multimodal downstream tasks.

tools.name: HunyuanVideo-Foley
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal diffusion with representation alignment for foley audio generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI tool for creating high-fidelity foley audio from video. It uses multimodal diffusion models with representation alignment to ensure the generated audio matches the video content.

tools.name: FLM
tools.one_line_profile: Free language modeling for efficient vision-language pretraining
tools.detailed_description: A framework for accelerating vision-language pretraining using a 'Free Language Modeling' approach. It optimizes the pretraining process for better efficiency and performance.

tools.name: alignment_macaque-human
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-species joint embedding alignment between human and macaque
tools.detailed_description: A scientific analysis tool for performing cross-species alignment, specifically creating joint embeddings between human and macaque data (likely neuroimaging or genomic), facilitating comparative biological studies.

tools.name: ARGF_multimodal_fusion
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial representation learning and graph fusion network
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for multimodal fusion and modality-to-modality translation using adversarial representation learning and graph fusion networks.

tools.name: X-modaler
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile and high-performance codebase for cross-modal analytics
tools.detailed_description: A modular and extensible framework for cross-modal research, supporting tasks like image captioning, visual question answering, and cross-modal retrieval. It provides unified interfaces for training and inference of various multimodal models.

tools.name: torchange
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Change Representation Learning Benchmark Library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library designed for change detection and representation learning in remote sensing. It provides a unified interface for datasets, models, and evaluation metrics to facilitate research in earth observation.

tools.name: JDE (Towards-Realtime-MOT)
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Detection and Embedding for fast multi-object tracking
tools.detailed_description: A widely used solver for Multi-Object Tracking (MOT) that learns a shared representation for detection and embedding (re-identification). It is applicable to scientific tracking tasks involving biological agents or particles.

tools.name: Text2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-modal retrieval tool aligning natural language descriptions with molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: Text2Mol is a cross-modal retrieval framework that aligns natural language queries with molecular representations. It enables semantic search for molecules using text descriptions, facilitating drug discovery and chemical property exploration by bridging the gap between chemical structures and textual data.

tools.name: SensorLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Framework aligning LLMs with motion sensor data for human activity recognition
tools.detailed_description: SensorLLM is a framework designed to align Large Language Models (LLMs) with time-series motion sensor data (e.g., IMU). It facilitates Human Activity Recognition (HAR) by enabling LLMs to interpret and reason about physical sensor signals, bridging the gap between raw signal processing and semantic understanding.

tools.name: Many Models Forecasting
tools.one_line_profile: Solution accelerator for large-scale time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A framework for training and managing thousands of time series forecasting models in parallel. It is designed for large-scale industrial and scientific forecasting tasks, automating the process of fitting independent models to distinct time series data subsets.

tools.name: Uni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Universal 3D molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: Uni-Mol is a universal 3D molecular representation learning framework that leverages transformer-based architectures to process molecular conformations. It supports various downstream tasks in drug discovery and chemistry, including molecular property prediction, conformation generation, and pocket-ligand binding prediction.

tools.name: ST-Align
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal alignment model for spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: ST-Align is a multimodal foundation model designed to align histology images with gene expression data in spatial transcriptomics. It facilitates the integration of visual tissue information with molecular profiles, enabling enhanced analysis of tissue architecture and gene function.

tools.name: mmflood
tools.one_line_profile: Flood delineation tool using Sentinel-1 SAR imagery
tools.detailed_description: A tool and dataset for delineating flood events from Sentinel-1 Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery. It provides multimodal data processing capabilities to identify water bodies and flood extent, supporting earth observation and disaster management tasks.

tools.name: NICE-EEG
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning framework for EEG-Image alignment
tools.detailed_description: NICE-EEG is a framework for decoding visual stimuli from EEG signals using contrastive learning. It aligns brain activity (EEG) with visual data to improve the biological plausibility and accuracy of neural decoding models, useful in neuroscience and brain-computer interface research.

tools.name: RS-TransCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Vision-Language model framework for remote sensing scene classification
tools.detailed_description: RS-TransCLIP is a framework that adapts Vision-Language Models (like CLIP) for Remote Sensing tasks. It specifically targets zero-shot scene classification by aligning satellite imagery with textual descriptions, overcoming the domain gap between natural images and remote sensing data.

tools.name: clip-image-search
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image search tool using fine-tuned CLIP models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for fine-tuning OpenAI's CLIP model specifically for medical imaging datasets (e.g., ROCO). It enables semantic search and retrieval of medical images using natural language queries, facilitating data exploration in healthcare research.

tools.name: text-to-image-eval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation toolkit for text-to-image and zero-shot classification models
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to evaluate custom and HuggingFace text-to-image or zero-shot image classification models (e.g., CLIP, SigLIP). It provides metrics such as zero-shot accuracy, linear probe performance, image retrieval quality, and KNN accuracy to assess model alignment and representation quality.

tools.name: DiT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Diffusion Models with Transformers implementation
tools.detailed_description: The official PyTorch implementation of Diffusion Transformers (DiT), a class of diffusion models that replace the traditional U-Net backbone with a Transformer. It serves as a foundational solver for generating high-fidelity images and learning scalable visual representations.

tools.name: ImageBind
tools.one_line_profile: Unified embedding space across six modalities
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning a joint embedding space across six different modalities: images, text, audio, depth, thermal, and IMU data. It enables holistic understanding and cross-modal retrieval/generation without requiring all modalities to be present during training.

tools.name: MultiModalExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for multi-modal embedding spaces
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to visualize and explore high-dimensional multi-modal embedding spaces. It supports scrolling, zooming, and searching via text, image, or audio queries to understand the layout and alignment of embeddings.

tools.name: SONAR
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual and multimodal fixed-size sentence embedding suite
tools.detailed_description: A complete suite for generating fixed-size sentence embeddings across many languages and modalities (speech and text). It includes encoders and decoders for creating unified representations suitable for translation and cross-lingual retrieval tasks.

tools.name: DETR
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Object Detection with Transformers
